items.label: Start as Samurai (Uchigatana bleed base)
Meet White Mask Varre at First Step (do not progress quest yet)

Map: Limgrave East (Mistwood)
Map: Weeping Peninsula
Gather early Smithing Stones (Limgrave Tunnels, Morne Tunnel)
Margit, the Fell Omen (unlock Castle Stormveil; you can delay clear)
Tree Sentinel (Limgrave)

Kenneth Haight → clear Fort Haight (later Varre/Medallion synergy)
Irina → Castle Morne letter delivery
Roderika at Stormhill Shack → Spirit Tuning unlock (via Hewg later)
Sorceress Sellen at Waypoint Ruins (future quest hub)
D, Hunter of the Dead (Summonwater) → opens Gurranq path
Blaidd (triggered by merchant’s “howl” in Mistwood)
Reduvia dagger (invader near Murkwater)
Bloody Slash (Fort Haight Knight) — early bleed art
Green Turtle Talisman (Summonwater area underground)
Maps: Liurnia East + North + West
Open Raya Lucaria (get Academy Glintstone Key from Dragon Smarag isle)
Caria Manor → defeat Royal Knight Loretta → reach Three Sisters
Start Ranni’s Quest at Ranni’s Rise (meet Blaidd, Iji, Seluvis)
Glintstone Dragon Smarag (optional for key island access)
Red Wolf of Radagon (Academy)
Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon (respec unlocked)
Stillwater Cave
Cliffbottom Catacombs
Lakeside Crystal Cave
Academy Crystal Cave
Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel
Black Knife Catacombs
Road’s End Catacombs
Thops (Church of Irith) → later give spare Academy key
Rya (near Laskyar Ruins) → Volcano Manor invitation later
Hyetta (Shabriri Grapes chain) around Liurnia
Iji (smith) at Road to the Manor → buy Carian Filigreed Crest
Carian Filigreed Crest (skill FP reduction — great for Corpse Piler later)
Glintstone Whetblade / Black Whetblade (infusions, Nokron later for Black)
Enter Siofra River (Mistwood lift) — activate map pillar
Light all flame pillars → fight Ancestor Spirit (optional)
Meet Blaidd in Siofra to keep his quest in sync
Siofra Aqueduct (Valiant Gargoyles — unlock Deeproot via coffin)
Map: Caelid + Dragonbarrow
Fort Gael + Fort Faroth sweep
Radagon’s Soreseal (Fort Faroth — huge stats, handle with care)
Commander O’Neil (drops Unalloyed Gold Needle → Millicent chain)
Decaying Ekzykes (rot dragon) — optional
Putrid Avatar (Minor Erdtree)
Sellia Crystal Tunnel
Abandoned Cave (Golden Scarab talisman)
Caelid Catacombs
Gaol Cave
Gowry ↔ Millicent questline (cleanse rot, help/call later)
Golden Scarab (Abandoned Cave) — +20% runes
Swarm of Flies (Mohgwyn approach cave — later when accessible)
Sync Blaidd, Sellen, Iji conversations (keeps story tidy)
Redmane Castle → Festival of Combat → defeat General Radahn
After Radahn: check in with Blaidd in Siofra; crater opens → Nokron access
Grand Lift of Dectus (Left: Fort Haight; Right: Fort Faroth) — ride lift
Ruin-Strewn Precipice path (Magma Wyrm Makar) for alternate access
Join Volcano Manor (Rya line) → perform contracts
Ancient Dragon Lansseax (Altus roaming)
Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy (ends Volcano Manor quest)
Lux Ruins (Demi-Human Queen Gilika)
Wyndham Catacombs
Seethewater Cave / Fort Laiedd loop
Bolt of Gransax (Leyndell) — MUST pick up BEFORE burning the Erdtree (pre-ashen Capital)
Give Fingerslayer Blade (from Nokron) to Ranni → unlock Renna’s Rise
Enter Ainsel River Main via Renna’s Rise → talk to Miniature Ranni (3x at grace)
Defeat Baleful Shadow → obtain Discarded Palace Key
Use key at Raya Lucaria Grand Library chest → acquire Dark Moon Ring
Progress Nokstella → Lake of Rot → Grand Cloister → Astel, Naturalborn of the Void
Deeproot Depths (via Gargoyles coffin) → Fia’s Champions → Lichdragon Fortissax (optional)
Mimic Tear (boss) → unlock swap/duel arena
Black Whetblade (weapon affinity flexibility)
Fingerslayer Blade (key item for Ranni)
Silver Tear Mask (Arcane boost)

phases.title: Phase 9 — Mountaintops of the Giants & Haligtree (Lv 120–150)

items.label: Fire Giant (required)
Consecrated Snowfield (Haligtree Secret Medallion: Left from Albus in Liurnia; Right from Castle Sol after Commander Niall)
Commander Niall (Castle Sol) → Haligtree medallion right
Ordina Liturgical Town puzzle → Haligtree access
Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree (gate boss)
Malenia, Blade of Miquella (optional, completionist)
Varre’s quest → Pureblood Knight’s Medal (fast Mohgwyn access)
Mohg, Lord of Blood (DO NOT touch cocoon yet — DLC later)
Seppuku Ash of War (Freezing Lake region scarab — Mountaintops)
Godskin Duo
Dragonlord Placidusax (optional secret arena)
Maliketh, the Black Blade
Return to Capital (ashen) → final boss sequence
Choose Ranni’s ending (summon sign)
Return to Mohg’s arena → Touch Miquella’s cocoon → Enter DLC
Do NOT start NG+ until you finish DLC on this save
Gowry in Caelid → accept to cure Millicent (Church of the Plague)
Beat Commander O’Neil → Unalloyed Gold Needle → return to Gowry
Cure Millicent → talk until loop; rest → talk again
Sellia: light towers / open gates → continue dialogue chain
Altus: meet Millicent (Erdtree-Gazing Hill / Windmill Village) → talk
Shaded Castle: get Valkyrie’s Prosthesis → give to Millicent
Dominula: Godskin Apostle → speak to Millicent again
Snowfield/Haligtree: meet Millicent near Drainage Channel (signs appear)
CHOICE: Help Millicent (gold sign) → Rotten Winged Sword Insignia OR Invade → Millicent’s Prosthesis
Waypoint Ruins: accept Sellen as master
Primeval Sorcerers: Azur (Mt. Gelmir), Lusat (Sellia Hideaway)
Return glintstones; Witchbane step
Raya Lucaria finale: help Sellen (gold) or Jerren (red)
Meet Nepheli at Stormveil → beat Godrick → speak in Roundtable
Kenneth Haight → clear Fort Haight → promise a new lord
Avoid giving Seluvis’s potion to Nepheli (keep Ranni route clean)
Resolve trio in Godrick’s throne room → Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone path
Meet Rya in Liurnia (recover necklace) → Volcano Manor invite
Do assassination letters; talk to Rya/Tanith between kills
Progress to Rykard → conclude Rya’s story
D at Summonwater → Roundtable
Deliver Deathroot to Gurranq (Bestial incants)
Altus: give Weathered Dagger to D’s brother
Deeproot: Fia’s Champions → (opt) Fortissax
Deliver Shabriri Grapes across Liurnia
Stops at Gatefront / Purified Ruins / Bellum Church
Frenzied Flame path can lock endings; be cautious
Find Boc (the “bush” in Limgrave) → give Sewing Needle
Golden Sewing Needle → tailor demigod gear
Message at Roundtable → Shunning-Grounds
Collect Seedbed Curses → choose path (ending-affecting)
Murkwater Cave fight → spare → merchant
Relocations: Scenic Isle → Volcano Manor

Mt. Gelmir hot springs → Farum Azula finale
Varre at First Step → Rose Church invasions

Yura (Bloody Finger Hunter) → Eleonora (Poleblade)
Diallos: Roundtable → Liurnia → Volcano Manor
